name: Hippo Burger
desc: A juicy in house burger made from ethically sourced grounded Hippos. Flame grilled to perfection.

name: Hippo Steak
desc: Our steaks are dry aged for 99 years to achieve the ultimate taste. Steaks are served only medium-rare, anything different is an insult towards our world-renown chefs.

name: Spaghetti + Hippo Balls
desc: Our spaghetti is made fresh daily accompanied by only the most juicy pairs of Hippo balls.

name: Hippo Pot Pie
desc: Freshly baked daily. This is the ultimate blend of sweet and savory to blast your taste buds to the next level.

name: Braised Hippo
desc: This braised Hippo meat will take you to Nirvana.

name: Hippo Milk
desc: Decadent flavour profile from the freshest of fresh Hippos

name: Orange Juice
desc: Sweet and tangy organic orange juice.

name: Special Hippo Cola
desc: A carbonated delight extracted from Hippos aged to perfection

name: Orange Soda
desc: Delicious and freshly juiced from our Hippos raised with oranga juice rather than water

name: House Hippo Salad
desc: A house salad from seasonal fresh greens. Chef's choice.

name: Walnut-Lentil Bologanese
desc: Boldly flavored, super hearty and incredibly easy, this vegan walnut and lentil bolognese recipe takes your plant-based eating goals to new heights.

name: Vegetable Soup of the Day
desc: Soup made from locally sourced ingredients.

name: Vegan Roasted Sweet Potato Salad
desc: Roasted sweet potatoes, avocado, black beans and raw kale are tossed in a creamy, lime dressing in this brightly flavorful, vegan sweet potato salad recipe.

name: Green Curry Buddha Bowl
desc: Our super curry bowl is super green and super good.

name: The Perfect Grilled Cheese
desc: This is the objectively optimum grilled cheese you will ever taste.

name: Ultimate Hippo Burger
desc: Can't believe it's not Hippo

name: Hot Wings
desc: These wings are so spicy they are barely legal.

name: Plain Ole French Fries
desc: Classic fries made from in-house grown potatos using the nutrient rich Hippo manure.

name: Meteor Mashed Potatoes
desc: In-house potatoes mashed with celestial strength.

name: Hippo Fingers
desc: Lean Hippo breast battered and deep fried until golden brown.

name: Hippo Tongue
desc: Thinly sliced and marinated for over 5 days in our secret marinade

name: Hippo Cheese Balls
desc: These spherical delights are made from in-house Hippo Cheese. The taste is out of this world.

name: Assorted Skewers
desc: Pork, Beef, and Chicken skewers to accompany your Hippo.

name: Ice Cream
desc: Made daily with our Hippo milk. Flavor is chef's choice.

name: Hippo Cheesecake
desc: Original Hippo cheese cake not found anywhere else.

name: Chocolate Cake
desc: Our own twist on a classic.

name: Selection of Hippo Cheeses
desc: Served with fruit compote, spiced almonds, and cranberry crisps.
